website_summaries.verdict: This is a bold shoe made with the quality you expect from Dr. Martens.
pros: A feminine take on a classic combat boot
Features a 1" platform and 4" chunky heel, yet the same cushioned sole for comfort
Block heel makes it easy to balance
cons: This heavy-duty boot tends to feel weighty

customer_reviews.title: Perfection
customer_reviews.text: I received them on time. I wore them the night I got them I walked and danced all night, they’re super comfortable! True to size. I got compliments by strangers, I’m in love. They go with shorts, jeans, skirts.. if you wanna look like a million bucks GET THESE!
customer_reviews.author: sabrina

customer_reviews.title: Insanely beautiful, hip, punk, stylish!
customer_reviews.text: Not sure how far I'll be able to walk in these, that's why they lose a star. They are comfortable. Totally. They just are a high heel and you know how heels go.....they aren't fluffy slippers.....but the craftmanship, style, and color are insanely beautiful. If you are just going to dinner or a movie for a few hours, I think these will be perfect, a concert where you have to stand and dance for five hours.... that's another thing. I am a true size 10.5 and I wear an 11 in flats and sneakers. In heels I wear a 10. So I bought the 10 and they are perfect. Even with thick socks.
customer_reviews.author: Becca

customer_reviews.title: Gorgeous Docs
customer_reviews.text: These are gorgeous. I got a size 7 (I wear a size 7.5-8) and I am happy I sized down. I also got the cherry red color, it is subtle and adds even more interest in my opinion. I have owned Docs before, never a Doc with a heel and these are just as comfortable and sturdy as the others! There is some squeak at first, I found it goes away after a while and I don’t lace them all the way up.
customer_reviews.author: Lucybomb

customer_reviews.title: Cute but the comfort is seriously lacking...
customer_reviews.text: I’m torn here... I LOVE the red colors on these boots. The tip of the toe is a bright rust red that fades to a beautiful deep cherry red. The look is sharp. Fit wise they feel very restrictive, probably because of the shiny plastic outside. Make sure you have about 10 minutes to put them on. I don’t like spending time on something like this, especially when I’m getting ready for work. The heel feels like it’s an inch too tall for the platform, they are hard to walk in. I’d return them if the colors weren’t so perfect, but the comfort is lacking so I won’t be wearing them too much...
customer_reviews.author: Jaclyn

customer_reviews.title: Buy them now - in a smaller size than u think
customer_reviews.text: Absolutely love these boots! Comfort of traditional Doc Martin boots in a stylish heel. They run BIG. I typically wear a 10 in closed toed shoes and heels, bought a 9 and have room to spare even with socks. Yes they have a plastic like sheen, I think this will age nicely when broken in. Yes, you need to break them in, like all leather boots, especially if your going to lace them all the way up. I would buy them again and again.... love them! Color is like a dark Dr.Pepper red/black. I swear it’s perfect and can be pulled off with black or darker brown outfit. Really stunning and unique, I actually prefer this color over straight black.
customer_reviews.author: The real JC

customer_reviews.title: Cool looking but bulky
customer_reviews.text: I like them and I’m keeping them but I will say that this new Kendra model is so bulky. I have an old pair of heeled lace-up docs that I’ve had for years and can no longer repair so I ordered a new pair and had to return to size down partly because they were a little big but also because they looked like brick houses on my feet. I got these in an 8 and fit just snug but still look so bulky on my legs. Perhaps it’s because I’m used to my older model that’s a bit more petite but I’m giving these a chance because they are cool looking!
customer_reviews.author: Greta M.

customer_reviews.title: Awesome 👢 boots! Do It!!
customer_reviews.text: Oh my!!!! These are every bit as comfy as I thought they would be! Plus the extra inches added to my 5’6” frame is awesome!!!! I will definitely buy another pair if and when these wear out. These are so comfy, I am able to walk around at an anime convention or other outing for 10+ hours!! FYI, I’m not normally a heel person, as they typically don’t have any cushion in the front.
customer_reviews.author: Paz

customer_reviews.title: Love at first sight!!
customer_reviews.text: I love these boots. I love these boots. I LOVE these boots! But then I am still a grunge girl stuck in the 90’s!! They’re so pretty I have a hard time wanting to wear them so I don’t scuff them up! But they’re surprising comfortable, and strangely the only heels I think I’ve ever owned that are more comfortable when standing than sitting.
customer_reviews.author: LEI

customer_reviews.title: Cute boots!
customer_reviews.text: Beautiful boots and great fit. Would highly recommend them. Funny story...when I first tried them on they were uncomfortable and too small, but then a friend stuck her hand in them to feel for something poking my foot. After she pulled the cardboard out of both boots, they fit great and were very comfortable. My advice...check for cardboard inside. LOL
customer_reviews.author: Amrinspring

customer_reviews.title: Unhappy with the material
customer_reviews.text: These boots are precious! However I disliked the material. The coating is luke plastic. I wore them once in the house and it was almost impossible to walk in them. They are kinda stiff. I bought the black ones which I would never in a million years return, however these ones where not for me.
customer_reviews.author: JLTorres:)

customer_reviews.title: love this boots! Even if I had to switch sizes
customer_reviews.text: Love this boots, comfortable, and beautiful I got a lot of compliments when I wore it. First I order a size 7..I read reviews online about the boots running bigger in size. I still ordered the 7... not big surprise when the boots arrived and look and felt too big for me. I ordered a size 6, when the boots arrived it fit perfect ! Retuned the 7 and got a refund right away without any issues
customer_reviews.author: Yarin Medina Roa

customer_reviews.title: My favorites!
customer_reviews.text: I love my first pair of heels. I am a university student, so I get in a lot of walking, and they do not hurt my feet. I had to put in inserts because they did not quite fit to my feet, which also helped keep them comfortable. I would also add that for my feet, I have to lace the as tight as I can, else my feet will move too much and be uncomfortable. Being my first and only pair of heels, I am not sure that is just these boots or all heels. The only thing I wish is a patent leather version in black. The red in these is pretty dark, but has lighter areas.
customer_reviews.author: Evelynn

customer_reviews.title: Love this!
customer_reviews.text: I love these boots! My sister wore a pair over the holidays and I’ve been obsessed ever since. Hers did look a tiny bit clunky on her feet but I mean c’mon, they’re Doc Martens! They looked awesome on her. And now, I can also say it looks awesome on me too! Anyway, I’m happy I found these here. I was prepared to pay full price but found my size marked down on Amazon. These boots are fun, comfy and fits true to size, which is another reason why I love and appreciate Doc Martens—I can always rely on their consistent sizing. Grab a pair, it’s worth it!
customer_reviews.author: Nola

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful and awesome
customer_reviews.text: These boots are awesome in every way! They look awesome. They feel awesome. Wow!! I got size 5 and they are roomy. I normally wear 5 1/2 or 6.
customer_reviews.author: Teve Lyde Fulton

customer_reviews.title: Awesome boots!  Just as pictured.
customer_reviews.text: These boots are super comfortable, I can stand and walk in them all day. They do run a little large, and would love in they came in half sizes. I ordered an size 8 but actually wear a 7.5. I haven't had any scuffs or blemishes, they seem very sturdy. I've worn them lots, even to work one day. And they are still like brand-new. Very high quality.
customer_reviews.author: Titenia

customer_reviews.title: #Worth
customer_reviews.text: These are really pretty boots! They're durable, comfortable, and look amazing. The only thing is when you first wear them they are going to be a bit tight, however once you break them in (which can take about 1 to 2 weeks, depending) they are pretty comfortable.
customer_reviews.author: Amanda

customer_reviews.title: Super cute unique colored Martin
customer_reviews.text: Super cute Martin with heels Not made by original material that it may be age differently From your other pairs I’ve received many compliments on these And It’s very comfortable for me to do long distance working Fits true or slightly bigger than your size
customer_reviews.author: Megami

customer_reviews.title: Very stylish and comfy
customer_reviews.text: I have received so many compliments on them. I wear size US 8 and I bought a size US 8. Normally, docs run bigger, but I have a wide foot and since these have a heal I knew I should stick with my normal size. They fit great and super comfy with normal and thicker socks. The only thing is they are a bit stiff and have a sound to them. The leather squeaks when you walk, but the noise fades once you break them in.
customer_reviews.author: Bettie

customer_reviews.title: Most expensive rubber duckies - Squeak Squeak Squeak
customer_reviews.text: Size: True to Doc Marten sizes if you’ve ever worn them before. Appearance: Great looking boot. Great color. Plastic coating is an issue. Comfortability: Not made to walk upstairs or for long periods of time. Bends in a weird spot that makes you lose balance going upstairs. WARNING: Shoes squeak TERRIBLY. Sounds like you’re walking on rubber duckies with every single step or movement... because they’re coated in plastic. Returned. The noise alone made me want to pull my hair out.
customer_reviews.author: AmbaGee

customer_reviews.title: Order A Size Down!
customer_reviews.text: I wear a size 6 pretty much across the board no matter the shoe, and a 36 in brands such as Dansko that use Euro sizing. I ordered a size down as was suggested, and the 5 was just right. I actually had enough room to add inserts to make the boots even more comfortable. These Kendra Cherry Red boots are beautiful & I have no regrets.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Super stylish!
customer_reviews.text: I absolutely LOVE these boots! So stylish. So cute. They stand out so you'll get many compliments. They're not full of cushion so the ball of my foot feels that, but nothing a Dr Scholl's cushion can't fix.
customer_reviews.author: Joyful

customer_reviews.title: Get these!!
customer_reviews.text: 6.5 but I always order 7 in boots, in order to accommodate socks. 7 was perfect. These boots are gorgeous, waterproof, sturdy, comfortable (as much as possible considering how high the heel is).
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Completely in love.
customer_reviews.text: These shoes are amazing and more comfortable than they look. They make any outfit really come together. I do not regret buying this boots. These shoes are unisex so they run big. For me I am a 9 so I ordered a 8 and it fit perfect.
customer_reviews.author: Roxanne

customer_reviews.title: My wife loves her new boots!
customer_reviews.text: My wife purchased these. She loves them. They fit just like all of her other Docs. She wears a size 8, bought a size 8 and they fit perfect. They did squeak for the first day that she wore them but after that they seem fine. Only other thing is that they seem a little more brown then “cherry red”...I mean there’s a hint of the red but more brown then red.
customer_reviews.author: Michael B.

customer_reviews.title: I love them!
customer_reviews.text: Great! They fit perfect I wear 6 1/2 and I have a high instep , I order size 6 and they fit like a glove. Also super comfy shoes.
customer_reviews.author: Alejandra Dionisio

customer_reviews.title: Not the comfiest, but gorgeous!
customer_reviews.text: Love these boots, they look amazing.... not the most comfortable. If you have to walk around for a long time, your feet will hate you, but you'll look fantastic!
customer_reviews.author: Dana Darko

customer_reviews.title: I love that everyone loves them.
customer_reviews.text: I’m in love with these boots, I wish I would have purchased them sooner, they are so comfy you forget you are wearing heels.I’m fortunate that they go up to size 11 which is what I wear. Ladies and gentlemen if you want compliments these are the boots for you.
customer_reviews.author: Raye

customer_reviews.title: Not Too Frankenstein-y
customer_reviews.text: Perfect- I wear size 5 1/2 and the five fits perfectly they are stiff at first like most docs but they will break in.
customer_reviews.author: Satine

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful color
customer_reviews.text: We bought these for my daughter. She loved them. She is normally a size 8 but in Doc Martin's she is a size 7. The boots are a beautiful reddish brown.
customer_reviews.author: Curtis J. Jevens

customer_reviews.title: Gorgeous! Order your regular size!!
customer_reviews.text: They are beautiful! But after reading what seemed like hundreds of reviews, I decided to size down as everyone said. Big mistake! I’m a size 7, and I couldn’t get my foot inside the 6. It was way too narrow in the front. Stick with your usual size and you should be fine!
customer_reviews.author: ryan j.

customer_reviews.title: Comfy with normal socks, front is too narrow and would hurt with winter socks
customer_reviews.text: This boot is comfy enough as long as you’re wearing socks that aren’t too thick. I am used to the standard dr martens boots so i find the tip if this too narrow. It hurts my feet when I tried to wear a winter sock with it. Walking with it is comfy even if its high, my only problem with it is the narrowness of the front part
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Kendra boot sizing and quality
customer_reviews.text: I loved these boots as soon as I saw them. Unfortunately I could not source in the UK and purchased from Amazon.com. I was unsure of sizing and quality. Customer service were extremely helpful and advised the sizing listed is US size not UK. I'm very happy with product, fits perfectly, comfy trying on and seem a good sturdy product. Very easy purchase and delivery process.
customer_reviews.author: Melanie G.

customer_reviews.title: Love love love them
customer_reviews.text: I do believe docs are very true to size! Mine are a little big only because they don’t offer half sizing, but it’s fine I’ll wear a thicker sock. But I LOVE the gum sole and these a truthfully the most comfortable heel that I own
customer_reviews.author: A

customer_reviews.title: Love them! Perfect!!!
customer_reviews.text: These are the most amazing shoes i’ve ever owned. They are comfortable, beautiful, platformed with heels 😍. I love them so much!! They are a bit squeaky but once you wear them for a bit the squeakiness went away. The heel was a bit higher than I expected it to be but otherwise i’m in love with these shoes😍😍😍😍 They look exactly like they do in the photo as well!
customer_reviews.author: Luna

customer_reviews.title: Rock yourself with a CONFIDENT statement!
customer_reviews.text: The fit is perfect, the slight tight fit on the upper ankle is very common with Dr. Martens. Just own it!! We are all made to look different and embrace our body and express with style! This shoe is a staple for grunge 90s this year right on trend, but also a classic loved brand and high quality made product. I pair mine with a skater dress and black tights.
customer_reviews.author: Lindsey Love 💘

customer_reviews.title: Cute but heavy.
customer_reviews.text: Roomy, 1/2 size bigger than other brands. Each shoe weighs about 2lbs. “Cherry Red” is actually dark burgundy to near-black.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Love it. But...
customer_reviews.text: A bit narrow. Fits slightly tighter than the other pair. Other than that, very comfy, loved the style and color.
customer_reviews.author: Zoey

customer_reviews.title: Comfortable and stylish
customer_reviews.text: I shocked at how perfect they fit and comfortable they are! They’re so understated too. I was concerned that they were too attention seeking... but they’re so cool and understated. Perfect for my style.
customer_reviews.author: Natalie

customer_reviews.title: Fierce Boots!
customer_reviews.text: A little more work to walk in but so so worth it! Gorgeous color that seamlessly goes with everything. Even though the leather in this style is suppose to be stiffer than their other boots, I was pleasantly surprised at how comfortable they were from day 1. **Sizing is not the same as my other Doc’s. I am a US sz.6 but my other Doc’s are a size 5. Perhaps due to the heel on this particular shoe.
customer_reviews.author: bluemoon

customer_reviews.title: Love these boots
customer_reviews.text: Gorgeous and very stylish. I get compliments all the time. Worth the price.
customer_reviews.author: Nikki

customer_reviews.title: GORGEOUS
customer_reviews.text: My first pair of Dr. Martens did not disappoint. Comfortable, stylish, versatile. Loooove.
customer_reviews.author: Squiggle

customer_reviews.title: Dr Martens
customer_reviews.text: I just bought an amazing pair at the 3 story in London. I recommend visiting the store (they even have little kids shoes)! If you go, pick out a pair, right size and name, and try them on, but order from Amazon. Amazon has the best prices
customer_reviews.author: Theresa Rushton

customer_reviews.title: Comfy and so cute!
customer_reviews.text: These are gorgeous! True to size, and so comfortable! I was able to walk a fair distance in Manhattan wearing these.
customer_reviews.author: Steph

customer_reviews.title: Confortable and fashionable
customer_reviews.text: I just love them and everybosy asks me where did I get them!!!
customer_reviews.author: Melcas

customer_reviews.title: the last pair of boots you'll ever need
customer_reviews.text: Absolutely ah-mazing. Solid made, super comfy, gorgeous. Can't take them off, almost ready to sleep in them. Can't take my eyes off them.
customer_reviews.author: reader33

customer_reviews.title: Love love them
customer_reviews.text: Should Of order a smaller size but other than that everything else is great
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: New fav boots
customer_reviews.text: They fit better than i expected and are so beautiful! A little squeaky at first but still love them.
customer_reviews.author: Victoria Fulenwider

customer_reviews.title: I would size down not up
customer_reviews.text: I wear a 7.5 the 8’s were to big. I ordered a 7 and they fit perfectly.
customer_reviews.author: Klaud

customer_reviews.title: I. Fuccking. Love
customer_reviews.text: Definitely real, and definitely adorable. Kinda uncomfortable with thin socks so prob double up on the socks to not get blisters, not gonna deduct a star for that though all shoes need to be worn in.
customer_reviews.author: Rose666

customer_reviews.title: I would recommend!
customer_reviews.text: I’m in love with these boots. They’re great quality, and super cute. If you’ve never purchased this brand just know they are a bit heavy on your feet.
customer_reviews.author: Nique

customer_reviews.title: They are cute 😘
customer_reviews.text: Must wear with socks! Or you will have scraped feet. Ouch. But overall they are perfect. Such a cute color.
customer_reviews.author: Lennys Barrera-Salazar

customer_reviews.title: Yay! Doc made a super comfortable high heel!
customer_reviews.text: Love this boot! Dress them up or down and, they look fantastic. Mine were (unfortunately) outside for a while before I retrieved the package; they were little stiff when they were cold. Warm them up before you get discouraged.
customer_reviews.author: ARJ

customer_reviews.title: Perfect fit. Comfortable.
customer_reviews.text: Love these Docs. Kendra. Check size chart. Fit perfectly, as expected .
customer_reviews.author: Kathryn Kramer

customer_reviews.title: Very comfortable
customer_reviews.text: I bought these for my wife. They now are her favorite boots. She loves them and says they’re very comfortable.
customer_reviews.author: Tom

customer_reviews.title: Love them
customer_reviews.text: These are some beautiful boots... the cherry color is everything! And they are very comfortable. Well worth the money
customer_reviews.author: sabrina mitchell

customer_reviews.title: Awesome
customer_reviews.text: I cannot explain how excited I found out they make docs with heels. I love them so much!
customer_reviews.author: Tara D.

customer_reviews.title: Totally worth it
customer_reviews.text: I love the boots. I bought a size smaller as I read the reviews that they run big. I am usually a size 9.5 or 10. I bought a 9 and it fit perfectly. They are comfortable to walk in and they get all the attention.
customer_reviews.author: Génesis Valdes

customer_reviews.title: Worth the buy!! Trendy and old skool
customer_reviews.text: True to size. I’m a 6.5 and I ordered a 5. A little small yet they need to be broken in. Adorable as all get out !!
customer_reviews.author: Dawn McCoy

customer_reviews.title: Make a Statement with this boot
customer_reviews.text: I don’t review much but this boot fits amazingly and looks super HAWT! I get so many compliments. Bringing it back to 93 and looking good doing it.
customer_reviews.author: Lorenzo's Aunt

customer_reviews.title: Nice boot.. had to give the boot the boot
customer_reviews.text: Normally I can size down not the patent leather. Size up
customer_reviews.author: Qiana

customer_reviews.title: terrible sizing/ customer support
customer_reviews.text: much too big annoying that you cannot return / replace size. Go to proper store to purchase
customer_reviews.author: natalee

customer_reviews.title: They are stunning!
customer_reviews.text: Tjey are stunning! They are a bit painfull right now (just have them a week or so) but I believe I 'll have to wear them more often to fit well like the flat ones from Dr. Martens.
customer_reviews.author: Samuela

customer_reviews.title: Too big
customer_reviews.text: I'm a 7.5 and an 8 US is too large. I have narrow feet so the medium width is a problem. It does not have good arch support as well.
customer_reviews.author: mercedes

customer_reviews.title: The order was perfect!!
customer_reviews.text: Size runs a little large so half sizes should order down. I did and the fit was perfect!! Loved the color and the style, and was amazingly comfortable!
customer_reviews.author: nandi baker

customer_reviews.title: Nice boot
customer_reviews.text: Nice color. True to size. Bought for my daughter as birthday gift. She loved it
customer_reviews.author: Quata

customer_reviews.title: Perfect boots!
customer_reviews.text: Beautiful boots! Classic Doc Marten quality and comfort. The color is amazing
customer_reviews.author: Tasia57

customer_reviews.title: Buy them their comfortable and fashionable
customer_reviews.text: I love these boots I get compliments all the time
customer_reviews.author: Lisa E.

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Love these shoes. A little bit edgy with a bit feminity to them. Comfortable.
customer_reviews.author: Victoria Crowers

customer_reviews.title: Cute heeled boots that are actually comfortable!
customer_reviews.text: Love these boots! They fit perfectly and look adorable with skinny jeans. The Dr. Marten sole makes them surprising comfortable even as a heel. I can wear them easily all day walking around the city.
customer_reviews.author: Heather E Goldstein

customer_reviews.title: Rockin Red Docs
customer_reviews.text: I love love love these Dr Martens! They are comfy, fit just right, and they legit rock!!!!
customer_reviews.author: Shannon Cain

customer_reviews.title: Poor Condition
customer_reviews.text: Boots arrived worn, scuffed, and laces broken. I can’t even exchange them for a new pair because the size is no longer available
customer_reviews.author: Dayna

customer_reviews.title: Quality and look as expected...
customer_reviews.text: Beautiful show and sturdy material, amazing color and really great comfort despite the heels. Not hard to break in, which is sometimes a problem with Dr Martens. Def. check the size chart before you buy.
customer_reviews.author: Polly

customer_reviews.title: Exactly what I expected from the brand name.
customer_reviews.text: Fit exactly like I wanted. Right to my normal size. Very comfortable and though they are a high heeled boot they are as comfortable as a low heeled boot. The color is beautiful. I can’t wait until cooler weather so I can wear them more often.
customer_reviews.author: Mrs B

customer_reviews.title: Great buy!!
customer_reviews.text: Ordered a size 6 which I wear between 6-6.5 and it fits comfortably with thick socks on. They look great and feel great!
customer_reviews.author: Britney

customer_reviews.title: Not that comfy
customer_reviews.text: They fit perfectly! Only problem is they are not comfortable for long term walking or teaching. Additional comfort support is-a-must.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Essential heeled boots
customer_reviews.text: Super comfy! Can wear them all day or night and my feet dont hurt! Great quality as well
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: IF you love Dr Martens you'll love this style.
customer_reviews.text: I love all Dr Marten's boots and these did not disappoint. They are comfortable and the added heal give a more fashionable look.
customer_reviews.author: HEIDI

customer_reviews.title: Fav boot
customer_reviews.text: Super comfortable and cute. I always get compliments on these.
customer_reviews.author: Alissa

customer_reviews.title: Durable and beautiful!
customer_reviews.text: SO IN LOVE WITH THESE. They’re so durable and the color is beautiful.
customer_reviews.author: Zandi Ashley

customer_reviews.title: Love these!
customer_reviews.text: They look as nice in person as they do on the picture!
customer_reviews.author: Shopgirls Ltd

customer_reviews.title: Love them.
customer_reviews.text: I love these boots. The color the thick heels everything. The boots are heavier than I expected. Can’t wait to wear them out
customer_reviews.author: dennise

customer_reviews.title: beautiful and durable what else can u ask
customer_reviews.text: Stylish, beautiful and durable what else can u ask for
customer_reviews.author: Rudy Mercado

customer_reviews.title: I love that my daughter loves the Doc Martens shoes
customer_reviews.text: I love that my daughter loves the Doc Martens shoes. She is on-trend and comfortable at the same time. Shhhh... don't tell her they are Therapeutic brand shoes gone Fashionable...Parents secret;-)
customer_reviews.author: gus brookshire

customer_reviews.title: Product as Advertised 10/10
customer_reviews.text: Ordered for my wife as she's been eyeing these for a while. She's normally a women's size 4-5, ordered the 5, fit was a little large as expected from Doc's but otherwise very comfortable. As other reviewers have noted the Cherry Red is plastic coated vs the wax coating of original models. However, considering Amazon's great price and convenient delivery vs the store she loves them. 10/10 will purchase from Amazon again.
customer_reviews.author: G.I. Joe

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for fall
customer_reviews.text: So easy to style and i got so many compliments 👌🏾
customer_reviews.author: 🤎Coco🤎

product_meta.title: Dr. Martens Women's Kendra Fashion Boot
product_meta.description:
The Kendra ankle boot by Dr. Martens is minimal yet tough, with a 10-eye high-heeled silhouette and a chunky commando rubber sole with heavy tread. This season, it comes in Arcadia, a classic cherry-red rub-off leather with a high shine.

Dr. Martens is the stuff of legends. It all began near Munich, Germany in 1945 when Dr. Klaus Maertens injured his foot in a skiing accident in the Bavarian Alps. To make walking easier during the healing process, he designed a shoe with an air-cushioned sole. Using old rubber tires, he constructed soles that had air trapped within closed compartments. He showed his prototype to his engineer/inventor friend, Dr. Herbert Funck, and together they decided to develop and produce the shoes. Not only did the shoe solve the doctor's immediate problem, but it also started to sell well in Germany. By 1959 the two decided that they needed a company to produce and distribute the shoes, then called Dr. Maertens, in other parts of the world. At first, many manufacturers rejected the concept of an air cushioned sole as a short-lived gimmick. However, the R. Griggs Group, located in the village of Wollaston in England, decided to go along with the idea by creating the first work boot with the revolutionary sole. On the first of April 1960, the first cherry red eight-eyelet work boot was produced and named 1460. To sell the brand name better in England, the name was anglicized to Dr. Martens. The range was branded AirWair and the rest is history.
feature_bullets: Made with Arcadia, a high-shine rub-off leather treated to reveal contrast leather with age
Constructed on the iconic, durable Dr. Martens air-cushioned sole
Retains classic Doc's DNA, like grooved sides, yellow stitching and scripted heel-loop
